Class User

java.lang.Object
User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Applicant, HDBManager
public abstract class User extends Object
An abstract base class representing a generic user in the system. Provides common properties and methods for all user types including authentication, profile management, and enquiry handling.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Default constructor initializes all fields with default values.

    • User

      public User(String name, String NRIC, int userID, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus)
      Parameterized constructor for creating a User with specific attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The user's full name
      NRIC - The user's National Registration Identity Card number
      userID - The unique identifier for the user
      password - The user's login password (will be hashed)
      age - The user's age
      maritalStatus - The user's marital status (SINGLE or MARRIED)

    • login

      public boolean login(String password)
      Authenticates the user by comparing hashed password input with stored password.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to verify
      Returns:
      true if authentication succeeds, false otherwise

    • editProfile

      public boolean editProfile(String filePath, int target)
      Modifies user information in the specified file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file containing user data
      target - The field to modify (name, NRIC, age, maritalStatus, or password)
      Returns:
      true if modification succeeds, false otherwise
